text: Clarence Marion Kelley (October 24, 1911August 5, 1997) was an American politician. He was the second Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation from 1973 to 1978. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Directors of the Federal Bureau of Investigation Category:Politicians from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Clarence M. Kelley
